HomeComponent.description: Hi, I'm Esdras — a Full Stack Developer crafting end-to-end solutions that bridge design, performance, and user experience. From backend API's to pixel-perfect frontend interfaces, I transform complex challenges into seamless digital experiences.

About.description: I'm proficient in a range of modern technologies that empower me to build highly functional solutions. These are some of my main technologies.

Footer.like: Like what you see? Reach out

Metadata.title: Nova Horizonte | Esdras Portfolio
Metadata.description: Nova Horizonte is a project focused on civil construction and engineering services, allowing clients to request quotes directly through the website. The project prioritizes an intuitive, responsive, and modern interface, ensuring the best user experience.
Metadata.keywords: civil construction, projects, skills, construction, engineering
Metadata.creator: Esdras

NovaHorizonte.title: A MODERN CIVIL CONSTRUCTION WEBSITE
NovaHorizonte.description: Nova Horizonte is a project focused on civil construction and engineering services, allowing clients to request quotes directly through the website. The project prioritizes an intuitive, responsive, and modern interface, ensuring the best user experience.

Metadata.title: Phantom Code | Esdras Portfolio
Metadata.description: A cross-platform desktop app that turns screenshots into solved code problems — instantly. Built for developers, students, and anyone who wants to speed through coding interview questions with the power of AI.
Metadata.keywords: ai coding, screenshot to solution, electron, nestjs, invisible coding app
Metadata.creator: Esdras

PhantomCode.title: A cross-platform desktop app that turns screenshots into solved code problems
PhantomCode.description: Phantom Code is a desktop application developed with Electron and React, now featuring a robust API built with NestJS. The application facilitates capturing code through screenshots and uses AI to extract and process this code, as well as generate solutions for programming problems in a more efficient and scalable way.

Metadata.title: Tarevity | Esdras Portfolio
Metadata.description: Tarevity is a modern task management application built with Next.js 16, TypeScript, Prisma ORM, and PostgreSQL. The application provides an intuitive and secure interface to help users organize their daily tasks with efficiency and style.
Metadata.creator: Esdras

Tarevity.title: a modern task management application
Tarevity.description: Tarevity is a modern task management application built with Next.js 16, TypeScript, Prisma ORM, and PostgreSQL. The application provides an intuitive and secure interface to help users organize their daily tasks with efficiency and style.

Metadata.title: Zipway | Esdras Portfolio
Metadata.description: Zipway is a fully-featured, responsive URL shortener that provides a seamless experience for authenticated users to create, manage, and share short links. Built on cutting-edge technologies like Next.js (App Router), Prisma ORM, Supabase, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui library components. It features secure authentication, short link redirection middleware, and automated testing with Jest and React Testing Library.
Metadata.creator: Esdras

Zipway.title: Modern URL shortener with control panel
Zipway.description: Zipway is a fully-featured, responsive URL shortener that provides a seamless experience for authenticated users to create, manage, and share short links. Built on cutting-edge technologies like Next.js (App Router), Prisma ORM, Supabase, Tailwind CSS, and shadcn/ui library components. It features secure authentication, short link redirection middleware, and automated testing with Jest and React Testing Library.
